events.title: Aoi Matsuri
events.description: The Aoi Matsuri, or Hollyhock Festival, is one of the three main annual festivals held in Kyoto. It features a procession beginning at the Imperial Palace and concluding at the Kamo Shrines, showcasing traditional costumes and cultural heritage.

events.title: Miyama Rice Planting Festival
events.description: A Shinto ritual held annually to pray for a rich harvest, featuring rice-planting maidens performing traditional practices on the second Sunday of May.

events.title: Tourist Tax Increase in Kyoto
events.description: Kyoto will adjust its tourist tax for travelers starting in 2026, aiming to enhance the city's cultural heritage preservation efforts.

events.title: BitSummit PUNCH 2026
events.description: Japan's largest indie game festival will take place at Miyako Messe in Kyoto from May 22 to 24, showcasing the works of independent game developers.

events.title: Cultural Events in Kyoto
events.description: A guide on upcoming cultural events in Kyoto, including immersive art exhibits and temple openings throughout 2026.
